Class CoordinateManager

java.lang.Object
  au.edu.ausstage.utils.CoordinateManager

public class CoordinateManager
extends java.lang.Object

A class to provide convenience methods for manipulating coordinates

isValidLatitude

public static boolean isValidLatitude(float latitude)
A method to validate a latitude value

Parameters:
latitude - the latitude to check is valid
Returns:
true if, and only if, the latitude is within the MIN and MAX latitude

isValidLongitude

public static boolean isValidLongitude(float longitude)
A method to validate a longitude value

Parameters:
longitude - the longitude to check is valid
Returns:
true if, and only if, the longitude is between the MIN and MAX longitude

A method to build four coordinates representing a bounding box given a start coordinate and a distance
